attributes.action: The Government should not hand over the Chagos Islands to Mauritius.
attributes.additional_details: There is every evidence in the media that the Chagos Islands issue is of great interest to the British people with widespread consensus that the Labour Government are without support on this issue.
attributes.background: Debate the issue in Parliament and preferably put a vote to the British people by referendum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Referendum on UK sovereignty over the Chagos Islands.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704312
